## The components {.smaller}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}
* Observation
    * Idea for hypothesis
* Induction
    * General rule
    * Hypothesis
* Deduction
    * Expectation / Prediction
    * Operationalization
:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
* Testing
    * Test hypothesis
    * Compare data to prediction
* Evaluation
    * Interpret results in terms of hypothesis
:::
